item.description:
This is a brunch meetup on a Sunday morning at The White Horse tavern. Expect plenty of room to spread out and converse while making the most of hot coffee and their brunch buffet.

If this meetup does fill up, have faith! Just drop me a line and we'll work something out.
-Winfield
item.how_to_find_us: Winfield will be at The White Horse shortly before the meetup and will be hanging out at the group's tables.
item.why: This group is very friendly, has great discussions, and is very diverse. We've all set aside the easy answers and ended up in different places, but all enjoy finding other people on a similar path.
item.name: Atheist Brunch @ The White Horse
